dcterms:description: A large-scale action recognition dataset with 400 categories, containing approximately 240,000 videos for training and 20,000 for validation. The dataset is unbalanced, with training samples in each category ranging from 250 to 1000.
dcterms:title: Kinetics-400 (K400)

dcterms:description: A balanced subset of Kinetics-400 with 200 categories, where each category contains 400 videos for training and 25 videos for validation.
dcterms:title: Mini-Kinetics (K200)

dcterms:description: A challenging dataset focusing on temporal reasoning, containing various scenes and objects in each category. It includes approximately 86,000 videos for training and 12,000 for validation, with 174 categories.
dcterms:title: Something-Something-V1 (SthV1)
